data.title: Monarchs - Chronological List (DEC 26, 2018) PDF
data.meta_description: Monarchs - chronological list (DEC 26, 2018).pdf - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This document provides an overview and lists of monarchs from various regions throughout history. It aims to chronologically list rulers from earliest times to the present for many historically significant areas. The lists cover rulers from the Ancient Near East, Persia, the Hellenistic world, Rome and its successors, Barbarian Europe, medieval and modern Europe, Crusader states, the Christian East, and the Islamic world. Each list provides the chronological order and short succession notes for the monarchs of a particular region or state.
